《CHRONICLES OF CRYSTAL: TURN-BASDE EPOCH》

A pixel style RPG world card Roguelike single-player game
Players will live in a mysterious medieval world. The world is full of adventure and challenge, you will embark on a legendary journey through the portal to different levels, randomly challenge a variety of powerful monsters, and engage in intense card battles.

Currently there are only (1) classes to choose from, I will add more classes and more gameplay in the future update (⬇there are future plans below⬇)
Each class has several card combinations, different equipment with different effects, multiple items, and more than 60+ cards per character

《Introduction to Gameplay》

We combine the RPG world with roguelike elements and use cards as the overall framework to create an innovative and classic game!
In the game, you will encounter various NPCS, equipment merchants, potion merchants, card merchants, pet merchants, and more

《Pet System》

In the battle, pets will follow themselves to join the battle, and will give the player a different effect!

《Difficulty Mode》

More difficult battles, new equipment and loot!

《Special Events》

In the level will encounter all kinds of unexpected random events!
Yes! Or is it bad? Bad luck or good luck? All to luck!

《Fishing System》

You can catch all kinds of unexpected catches in the waters!

《In the Game》

There are NPCS in the RPG world that talk to you, guide you, and help you survive
There's the ultimate roguelike gameplay, endless possibilities!

《In Battle》

All monsters you encounter are random, with new experiences every time you enter!

《Game Support》

One-handed operation
The game supports the whole single-hand operation, right movement, left button interaction!
Free your hands ~
The main game: If you can't beat it, go home, you can find various NPCS to improve your fighting power! As long as you have the money!

《Game Future Planning》

Future additions:
Classes: More classes, more cards, more items and loot, etc
Gameplay: Endless mode, Hard mode (Dark night system), Hidden mode!
After the update, I will publish every update and BUG repair announcement in QQ group and Steam!
